title: Orange essence changes
body: hey y'all i saw i youtube vid that said that the value of orange essence might be changing in the preseason so you will only recieve .6 of the orange essence from any skin shards that you have. i know about the changes to blue essence, just wondering if anyone knows whether this is true and if i should be disenchanting my skin shards before the ''potential'' orange essence value drop in preseason?

replies.body:
To my knowledge, the 'value' of the essence remains the same. It still takes the same amount of orange essence to buy/unlock things etc.

However there will be a decrease in the amount of essence you get when you disenchant skin shards.

So yes, any skin shards you don't want to unlock _(or keep for re-rolling purposes)_, you would be better off disenchanting them now, before pre-season arrives.
